mapper.select: SELECT a.animal_name AS animalName, date_format(dia.diagnosis_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS diagnosisDate, dia.diagnosis_symptom AS diagnosisSymptom, ah.animal_hospital_name AS animalHospitalName FROM diagnosis AS dia JOIN animalhospital AS ah ON dia.seq_animal_hospital = ah.seq_animal_hospital JOIN animal AS a ON dia.seq_animal = a.seq_animal WHERE dia.seq_doctor = 1 AND dia.seq_animal = 1 ORDER BY dia.diagnosis_date DESC

SELECT seq_animal AS seqAnimal, seq_protector AS seqProtector, animal_name AS animalName, animal_type AS animalType, animal_size AS animalSize, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y') - DATE_FORMAT(animal_age, '%y') AS animalAge, (case when animal_gender = 0 then 'Male' else 'Female' END) AS animalGender, animal_weight AS animalWeight FROM animal WHERE seq_animal = #{seqAnimal}
